item.title: Product Flow Diagram
item.description: A key and highly relevant strength of PRINCE2 is its focus of product-based planning (as opposed to planning based on tasks). This is even more relevant now - in the age of Micro-services, mobile apps, and long-running Agile Roadmaps.
